    • Method Detail

      • createMap

        static Map createMap()
        Creator of the map.
        Returns:
        a new map.

      • getPos

        Cell getPos(Row row,
            Col col)
        Getter of the cell at specific coordinate.
        Parameters:
        row - the row number [1-10].
        col - the col number [A-J].
        Returns:
        the cell at designated position.

      • replaceCell

        void replaceCell(Row row,
                 Col col,
                 Cell newCell)
        Place cell at specific coordinate with a new cell.
        Parameters:
        row - the row number [1-10].
        col - the col number [A-J].
        newCell - the new cell that used for placement.

      • prettyPrint

        void prettyPrint(ConsolePrinter printer)
        Print the map.
        Parameters:
        printer - the printer used to print the map.
